content.text: 1/2 cup whole bran cereal or wheat germ
content.eamr: ( ing-12 "1/2 cup whole bran cereal or wheat germ" )

content.text: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Spray or grease one 9x13 inch pan.
1) Prepare the topping by mixing together the brown sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg and chopped pecans.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "mixing"@26:32 / AC
		:subtask ( purp-1-0 "Prepare the topping"@3:22 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( ing-0 "the brown sugar"@42:57 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "cinnamon"@59:67 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "nutmeg"@69:75 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "chopped pecans"@80:94 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Sift together the flour, baking powder, baking soda and salt.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Sift"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-4 "the flour"@17:26 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "baking powder"@28:41 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "baking soda"@43:54 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "salt"@59:63 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Blend together butter and sugar; add eggs and beat well; Add apple butter, vanilla, wheat germ or bran cereal; Add sifted dry ingredients alternately with sour cream; mix well after each addition.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Blend"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-8 "butter"@18:24 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-9 "sugar"@29:34 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-3-1 "add"@36:39 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-14 "eggs"@40:44 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-3-2 "beat"@49:53 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-3-3 "Add"@-1:-1 / AC
		:ppt ( "apple butter"@-1:-1 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "vanilla"@-1:-1 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "wheat germ or bran cereal"@-1:-1 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-3-4 "Add"@114:117 / AC
		:ppt ( "sifted dry ingredients"@118:140 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-13 "sour cream"@158:168 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-3-5 "mix"@170:173 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:todo ( "after each addition"@-1:-1 / OTHER )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Pour 1/2 batter into pan, sprinkle 1/2 the topping over top; Pour remaining batter and top with remaining topping.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Pour"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( "1/2 batter"@8:18 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-5-0 "pan"@24:27 / TOOL )
	)
	:inform ( ac-5-1 "sprinkle"@29:37 / AC
		:gol ( "top"@59:62 / OTHER )
		:ppt ( "1/2 the topping"@38:53 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-5-2 "Pour"@64:68 / AC
		:ppt ( "remaining batter"@69:85 / FOOD )
		:gol ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-5-3 "top"@90:93 / AC
		:ppt ( "remaining topping"@99:116 / FOOD )
		:gol ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)
